reviewText:
After buying collections 1 and 2 it seemed like forever until they released collection 3 and I figured it would be about a year until the released Collection 4. I'm happy to be wrong! (Aye Sir!)

Collection 4 includes Episodes 73-96 and has the Dub and the Sub as well as giving you the option of DVD or Blu-Ray all in one nice package. I would strongly recommend this to any Fairy Tail fan and since you are reading this, I'm going to go out on a limb and assume you know about Fairy Tail and Collections 1-3.

The moral of the Story is that this is a great show and the Collections make it easier to keep them in a nice order. Really a collectors dream come true.

If you like Fairy Tail then this is a no brainer.

Highest Possible Recommendation!
awesome

These collection sets are definitely the best way to buy these episodes.  Being a huge fan of the series, I finally decided that I needed to put my money where my mouth is and support the people dubbing these series for us.  Fairy tail is an awesome series with great character development.  I love the characters. They are so quirky and fun that I have relived their adventures with them many times.
Love this show.
Amazing anime series, if you are a Fairy Tail fan or someone looking for an anime with good laughs, loads of humor, action and feelings you got to have this one :-)
Another great collection to own for Fairy Tail fans!

No excuses. I expect better. Not cool.
amazing, not the best episodes. but you need this to connect the dots between the series arcs.

Have only watched the first two seasons when it first came out, but I love this anime. I ordered all the collections and pre ordered the newest one being released the 28th of March. It's another epic anime for the shelves.

When I received my item, at first there was nothing wrong with it. Then the next day, its like someone cracked the sides of the DVD case where it folds to open and close and I hadn't even touched it hardly except to take the plastic off. No DVD's were scratched so that's good.
Fairy Tail always gets 5 stars (it would get 100 if I could!). This show looks amazing in BluRay!!! :D

Fairy Tail is an enjoyable series.  It has some very animated parts but its full of action, comedy, drama and its got a pretty decent story.  Really enjoy how it goes into a lot of the characters backgrounds which build up into the main story.  Its an anime my wife really got into as well, and shes just starting to get into anime.
LOVE IT

My favorite season yet. This season ties in Happy's backstory. **Trying not to spoil anything** You get a very intense story and a lot of questions answered in very cleaver ways.

Collection 4 includes Episodes 73-96 with English subs and dubbing. Should you watch it? Aye sir!
kids loved it
Soo in love with this show

Can't begin to say how much I love Fairy Tail! I'm always trying to cut corners and save every penny I can, after searching countless websites I still ended coming back to Amazon, best priced at time of purchase. Support your anime! While CrunchyRoll and Hulu are nice, I always try and buy the hard copy~Lets the creator/producers know that you want more lol Package arrived on time, not scratches on outer box( for some reason that's always a big deal to me...). Can't wait to have the English voice actors sign this at next con!!!!

It's a great show, really one of my favorites. I love buying the collection packs of Fairy Tail because they are easier to keep track of than the smaller volumes they sell. Plus it was shipped and delivered quite quickly.
5 stars, It is very good.

My favorite anime. I was a little worried about switching to the English dubs after watching season 1 in Japanese but after a few episodes, it was completely comfortable. The story is really well done and the characters are all lovable in their own way. It is super family friendly (unlike several other good animes) and we all watch it together when a new disk arrives. We've all taken to Fairy Tail so much that the entire family cosplays at local conventions.
On time. Great show!

I've previously bought the first three collections myself and the quality of this one matches the rest. I highly recommend any anime fans pick up these collections, they look great on my shelf :)

Fairy tail is an anime that can be enjoyed by almost everyone. It's light hearted and fun to watch. Occasionally there is an episode that's a side splitter such as the one where the characters switch bodies.
